title: Town Center
description: The heart of our community with shops, restaurants, and events.

title: Local Museum
description: Explore the rich history and culture of our town.

title: Community Park
description: Open green space with walking paths and playgrounds.

title: City Library
description: A quiet place to read, study, and attend events.

title: Historic Theater
description: Enjoy live performances and film screenings.

title: Riverwalk
description: Scenic walking paths along the river with cafes.

title: Local Market
description: Fresh produce, local crafts, and community gatherings.

title: Art Gallery
description: Contemporary art exhibitions from local artists.
